title: Famous handshaker in new role. Washington, D.C., Sept. 9. After greeting precallers at the White House executive office last 36 years, Lieut. Ernest M. Lar[...] has retired and accepted a post in charge [...] deposit vaults for a local bank. 'Larry' has probably greeted more famous people than any other[?] person in the world. Before coming to the Wh[...] during the first Roosevelt Administration he [...] for four years a member of the Metropolitan Police Force
